lead_paragraph: Even as gun battles rage in Rio de Janeiro slums, mutilated bodies wash up on beaches and police and fireman protest, the USOC on Thursday declared the 2016 Olympics will be the safest place in the world for athletes once the Games begin.

headline.print_headline: Rio Will Be Safest Place in World for Athletes: USOC
headline.main: Rio Will Be Safest Place in World for Athletes: USOC

snippet: Even as gun battles rage in Rio de Janeiro slums, mutilated bodies wash up on beaches and police and fireman protest, the USOC on Thursday declared the 2016 Olympics will be the safest place in the world for athletes once the Games begin....
